xml.title: DAU By Date
xml.description: This report shows the DAU by date for a selected game and or client for a specified date range.
xml.query: select stat_date as Date, sum(value) as DAU from star.s_game_day where game_id=$gameid and client_id=$clientid and stat_date between '$startdate' and '$enddate' and metric='ActiveUsersByDay' group by 1 order by 1
xml.parm: select distinct game_id, game_name from lookups.l_flurry_game order by 2
